name: Nepeta Cataria
description:
Use up/right to allow the matching cats into the club and down/left to dismiss those that don't quite meet the VIC requirements

Done for Ludum Dare 34

A game by Lindsey Bieda and Jackie Kircher focusing on the Ludum Dare theme of two button control where you hit right to allow cats into the club that match the requirements on the VIC list and left to dismiss those who aren't quite there.

Additional vocals provided by Lindsey's cat Dash
Music CC provided by strangeday

Ludum Dare page for this game
